patthana15.47:1.1: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhū nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana15.47:2.1: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhū naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Abyākatamūlaṁ tīṇiyeva paccayavasena.)
